segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the children in the center of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really unstable; its legs are splayed outward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching up towards an open cabinet, his hand deep in a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the label clearly: "COOKIE JAR," full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby is reaching up, clearly in on the plan, expecting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their secret mission, it's quite amusing to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't tip over; it looks like it could at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, maybe to catch the cookies or as a makeshift lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a clever little scheme they've got going while the adult is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be working together perfectly to get those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tension of the unstable stool adds a real sense of drama to their heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies they've already managed to get.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely oblivious to the rising water level near the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a hotbed of unnoticed activity.
segments.speaker: PAR
